presentationTable.name: Facts - Absence Calendar
presentationTable.description: A folder containing measures related to duration and frequency of absence transactions segregated by absence plans. These measures are based on daily break down of absence transactions. Enable "Include in daily report breakdown" in Fusion Application for these measures to work.

presentationColumns.name: Total Duration of Absences (Days)
presentationColumns.description: Sum of duration of all Absences
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Absence Daily Details.Total Duration of Absences (Days)

presentationColumns.name: Total Duration of Absences (Hours)
presentationColumns.description: Sum of duration of all Absences, for absence type with UOM='Hours'
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Absence Daily Details.Total Duration of Absences (Hours)

presentationColumns.name: Qualification Plan Absences Duration
presentationColumns.description: Sum of duration of approved absences of Qualification Plans
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Absence Daily Details.Qualification Plan Absences Duration

presentationColumns.name: Number of Qualification Plan Absences
presentationColumns.description: Count of distinct approved absences of Qualification Plans
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Absence Daily Details.Number of Qualification Plan Absences

presentationColumns.name: Accrual Plan Absences Duration
presentationColumns.description: Sum of duration of approved absences of Accrual Plans
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Absence Daily Details.Accrual Plan Absences Duration

presentationColumns.name: Number of Accrual Plan Absences
presentationColumns.description: Count of distinct approved absences of Accrual Plan
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Absence Daily Details.Number of Accrual Plan Absences

presentationColumns.name: Compensatory Plan Absences Duration
presentationColumns.description: Sum of duration of approved absences of Compensatory plans
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Absence Daily Details.Compensatory Plan Absences Duration

presentationColumns.name: Number of Compensatory Plan Absences
presentationColumns.description: Count of distinct approved absences of Compensatory Plans
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Absence Daily Details.Number of Compensatory Plan Absences

presentationColumns.name: NoEntitlement Plan Absences Duration

presentationColumns.name: Number of NoEntitlement Plan Absences
presentationColumns.description: Count of distinct approved absences of NoEntitlement Plans
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Absence Daily Details.Number of NoEntitlement Plan Absences

presentationColumns.name: Approved Absence Transactions
presentationColumns.description: Count of distinct absences transaction with approval status as "Approved"
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Absence Daily Details.Approved Absence Transactions

presentationColumns.name: Completed Absence Transactions
presentationColumns.description: Count of distinct approved absence transactions with past dated absence end date
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Absence Daily Details.Completed Absence Transactions

presentationColumns.name: Pending Approval Absence Transactions
presentationColumns.description: Count of distinct absences transaction with approval status as "Awaiting Approval"
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Absence Daily Details.Pending Approval Absence Transactions

presentationColumns.name: Scheduled Absence Transactions
presentationColumns.description: Count of distinct approved absence transactions with future absence start date
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Absence Daily Details.Scheduled Absence Transactions

presentationColumns.name: In-Progress Absence Transactions
presentationColumns.description: Count of distinct absences transaction with Approval Status as "In-Progress"
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Absence Daily Details.In-Progress Absence Transactions

presentationColumns.name: Worker Count (Approved Absences)
presentationColumns.description: Count distinct worker with absences transactions with approval status as "Approved"
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Absence Daily Details.Worker Count (Approved Absences)

presentationColumns.name: Worker Count (Pending Absences)
presentationColumns.description: Count distinct worker with absence transactions with approval status as "Awaiting Approval"
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Absence Daily Details.Worker Count (Pending Absences)

presentationColumns.name: Female Gender Ratio (Approved Absences)
presentationColumns.description: Female gender ratio with approved absences
